Hello,

I am trying to install Cantera 1.5.4 with Cygwin.

The configure script seemed to run ok and generated the appropriate 
Makefiles.  However, when I type "make", somethhing goes awry.  All 
of the .f files appear to get compiled, and then I get an error when 
I believe all of the .o files are getting linked: 

make[2]: *** [/cantera-1.5.4/build/lib/i686-pc-cygwin/libctlapack.a] 
Error 127

Any thoughts?

Thanks

Mark
